column4: I am used to mint, it seems I cant get my inspiron 1501 to hook wirelessly to ubuntu 11.10??? help.
I loaded the brodcom driver but can not get hooked to a wireless network
yes it did hook with mint
with mint i needed a wired connection to load restricted drivers then it worked
no i am not knowing this
it gave me an optio to activate the driver
run lsusb and pastebin the output
laptops can't hook wirelessly to operating systems so that's WAD
no it didn't. it connected to a wireless network. Your laptop did not, however, hook wirelessly with mint"
okay well have you got a connection?
and how did you "load the brodcom drivers"
pastebin the output of the command "lsusb" and send me the link
please tag me when you talk to me so I can see you have responded
